languages.text: "Видит Бог-Император, на каждой планете — свой культ Его. Однако разглагольствовать о смене раз и навсегда назначенной Императором участи может только еретик".

traits.locale_text: "Сознательность, с которой он изучал влияние чужих жизней на свою личность, поражает, не так ли? Не исключаю, что его фантазии действительно обрели материальную форму. Вопрос, какую".

languages.text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."
languages.original_text: "Видит Бог-Император, на каждой планете — свой культ Его. Однако разглагольствовать о смене раз и навсегда назначенной Императором участи может только еретик".

traits.locale_text: "The God-Emperor only knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him the same way. But only a heretic can wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

"The God-Emperor only knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him the same way. But only a heretic can wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

"The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

languages.text: "Der Gottimperator allein weiß, wie viele verschiedene Kulte es zu seinen Ehren gibt. Keine zwei Planeten beten ihn auf die exakt selbe Weise an. Doch nur ein Ketzer würde davon schwärmen, dass man ein unumstößliches Schicksal ändert, das vom Imperator bestimmt wurde."
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gottimperator allein weiß, wie viele verschiedene Kulte es zu seinen Ehren gibt. Keine zwei Planeten beten ihn auf die exakt selbe Weise an. Doch nur ein Ketzer würde davon schwärmen, dass man ein unumstößliches Schicksal ändert, das vom Imperator bestimmt wurde."

languages.text: « Seul l'Empereur-Dieu sait combien de cultes différents de sa personne existent. Il n'y a pas deux planètes qui le vénèrent de la même manière. Cela dit, seul un hérétique oserait se vanter de pouvoir changer le destin décrété par l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

traits.locale_text: « Seul l'Empereur-Dieu sait combien de cultes différents de sa personne existent. Il n'y a pas deux planètes qui le vénèrent de la même manière. Cela dit, seul un hérétique oserait se vanter de pouvoir changer le destin décrété par l'Empereur. »

languages.text: 「いかに多くの『神帝崇拝』のさまざまな教団が存在するかは神帝陛下のみぞ知るでしょう。どの惑星でも、その崇拝の仕方は一様ではありません。だが、ただ皇帝陛下によって定められた運命を変えようなどと詩的に語る者がいるなら、それは異端者に他なりません」
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

traits.locale_text: 「いかに多くの『神帝崇拝』のさまざまな教団が存在するかは神帝陛下のみぞ知るでしょう。どの惑星でも、その崇拝の仕方は一様ではありません。だが、ただ皇帝陛下によって定められた運命を変えようなどと詩的に語る者がいるなら、それは異端者に他なりません」

languages.text: «Solo el Dios Emperador sabe cuántos cultos le veneran. No hay dos planetas en los que reciba adoración del mismo modo exacto. Pero solo un hereje alabaría la alteración permanente de un destino ordenado por el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

traits.locale_text: «Solo el Dios Emperador sabe cuántos cultos le veneran. No hay dos planetas en los que reciba adoración del mismo modo exacto. Pero solo un hereje alabaría la alteración permanente de un destino ordenado por el Emperador».

languages.text: “具体有多少支教派以各自不同的方式崇拜神皇，恐怕只有祂本人才清楚。每颗行星都有各自崇拜神皇的方式，不过，恐怕只有异端分子才会打算彻底颠覆祂安排好的命运。”
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

traits.locale_text: “具体有多少支教派以各自不同的方式崇拜神皇，恐怕只有祂本人才清楚。每颗行星都有各自崇拜神皇的方式，不过，恐怕只有异端分子才会打算彻底颠覆祂安排好的命运。”

languages.text: "Kendi adına kaç tarikat olduğunu ancak Tanrı İmparator bilir. Her bir gezegen, O'na kendi âdetlerine göre tapar. Ancak İmparator'un kesinkes bahşettiği kaderi değiştirmeyi böyle ağdalı bir dille övmek, ancak bir kâfiri yapacağı şey."
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor alone knows how many different cults of Him there are. No two planets worship Him in quite the same way. But only a heretic would wax poetic about altering a fate that was ordained by the Emperor once and for all."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi adına kaç tarikat olduğunu ancak Tanrı İmparator bilir. Her bir gezegen, O'na kendi âdetlerine göre tapar. Ancak İmparator'un kesinkes bahşettiği kaderi değiştirmeyi böyle ağdalı bir dille övmek, ancak bir sapkının yapacağı şey."
